content: For the third quarter of 2022, total revenue $185 million, down 14% year-over-year and 5% quarter-over-quarter. Online game revenues were $149 million, down 11% year-over-year and 5% quarter-over-quarter. For Sohu Media Portal, quarterly revenues were $50 million, down 11% year-over-year and 6% quarter-over-quarter. For Sohu Video, quarterly revenues were $60 million, down 29% year-over-year and up 4% quarter-over-quarter. For Changyou's online game business and 17,173, quarterly revenues $150 million, down 11% year-over-year and 6% quarter-over-quarter. Online game revenues to be between $118 million and $128 million, this implies annual decrease of 11% to 18% and a sequential decrease of 14% to 21%.
